author: Treystun

text: My favorite Shimomura soundtrack and one of my favorites in a video game. I like this game so much I made a "Journey in Music" video shortly after opening this channel (see description). Seaside Town especially is one of my favorite town themes, I even made a simple piano cover of it. Monstro Town is also very good, the game is just full of personality and Shimomura perfectly captured it.
author: SupraDarky

text: @SupraDarky One of the most enjoyable JRPGs I ever played.
